website_summaries.verdict: Super compact, lightweight design makes it ideal for parties and snapping photos on the go.
pros: Very convenient – small enough for your pocket or clutch, and prints instantly without needing a computer
Can use app to personalize beyond the basic, default white border
Can print photos from almost any device
cons: Quality of ZINK paper is disappointing to some users

customer_reviews.title: Gets held up printing resulting in LINES, awful color too
customer_reviews.text: This gets held up while printing and results in lines in all the pictures. The colors are awful by the way, not sure why this has so many 5 stars as I was very excited to try this out, this being my third instant print camera.
customer_reviews.author: RedSteger

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Product is very user friendly. My kids had an amazing time taking selfies! Pictures printed are good quality and just fun!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and better photos
customer_reviews.text: Polaroid Pop works perfect with WiFi connectivity and it prints quickly from my phone as it does from the camera too. The 20 MP sensor captures bigger and better photos with the size of 3.5 x 4.25 It prints higher quality photos because of the no ink Zink paper.
customer_reviews.author: Allison P

customer_reviews.title: The worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why other reviewers are put 5 stars to this camera, because it is the worst thing I ever bought. The quality of the pictures is awful, I can't understand why a 20mp camera has such a bad quality in pictures. And the quality of the pictures is much worse, even if you take a picture with a very high quality camera the picture printed with this is really awful. The colors are really bad, it looks pretty fuzzy. I do not recommend this and really want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Duran

customer_reviews.title: Without limits
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so something awesome just got offered by Polaroid Pop. I use it as a video camera too and I can save more photos and videos using an sd card. The bright colors pop with the Pop and not just with the photos printed but the color of the camera itself. I love showing it to people and falunting it to make other jealous of my cool camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Field of view
customer_reviews.text: I am irrevocably impressed by the field of view of this camera. It gathers as much as it can and so far, I get the whole picture I wish to capture.
customer_reviews.author: Libby J

customer_reviews.title: Cute camera, weird noise, stains very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, but makes a weird loud sound when printing. And prints take almost 40 seconds. But pictures are good (for Polaroid) and it's great that I can print photos from my phone. The shiny black part is covered in fingerprints already and the bottom part has already gotten scuffs on it from being in my bag so that's a downside. The touch screen is very responsive though and it's a cute camera.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Gaye

customer_reviews.title: Go with a cheaper version. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not what it is billed to be. We got it for an event and ended up having to purchase 2 other cameras at the last minute because this camera is so terrible. It took 5 pics and overheated. Printed 3 copies of every pic, and the battery drained excessively fast. It would have been useless to us. Thank God we tested prior to the event or we would have been disappointed. Only good part was the touchscreen and the ability to view pics before printing. But then it printed 3 copies of each pic so didn't save any money on film.
customer_reviews.author: Brea Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures and makes great prints
customer_reviews.text: I love a nice Royal Blue, which is why I ended up going with this one in particular. It takes good pictures and makes great prints.
customer_reviews.author: Elias TIBBS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this camera. But when i received it, it would not charge. I tried several different charging blocks and using the reset button. I contacted the company through their chat feature and I was told that if I did those things already to no avail then the battery was most likely defective and I had to send it back. I also came across some bad reviews about the camera stating that it was buggy and had to be reset often. So I chose to get a different camera upon return
customer_reviews.author: whizmo76

customer_reviews.title: Picture and Video
customer_reviews.text: Not only you can take pictures but also take videos. with HD quality now thats worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this but the picture quality is equal to a 2006 flip phone camera. I can't believe how expensive this was. Returned
customer_reviews.author: alana

customer_reviews.title: Why are you waiting to buy such an amazing device!?!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was such a great purchase for my bachelorette party! I love that it prints like the original Polaroid in the bigger style! I also love that I can either take pictures/ videos/ gifs on the pop or send my own pictures from my phone to it! It prints off in about 15 seconds and it only takes about 10-15 seconds to connect to the Bluetooth- so within a minute your Polaroid pic is printed! My friends loved this little printer so much that they bought one too! Can’t wait to use this at my wedding and future adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Christen Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Would be a 0 if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Camera wouldn’t take paper, and when it did it wouldn’t print. When I could get the paper in it wouldn’t print the setup image. The 1 time it did print, it was all muddy and murky looking because it wouldn’t print the set up picture. Glad I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Charging
customer_reviews.text: Charging is made easy because of this awesome polaroid. It connects to usb cable just fine and I never had a problem encountered when charging it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love my pop
customer_reviews.text: I love my polaroid pop! I love that you can change the colors of the pop ! App works well with pop I Jus got it today so I haven’t used the video recorder yet but so far I’m very happy 3rd update iv uploaded photo that I transferred from my phone to the polaroid pop! The photos that I transfer need a frame or they won’t come out correct I dislike that or maybe I’m doin something wrong I didn’t read the instructions lol but picture quality is great ! I don’t kno what these other reviewers are talking about
customer_reviews.author: SuesueMama

customer_reviews.title: Bad,bad,bad!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what these other reviewers are talking about. The picture quality is poor at best. Was extremely disappointed in this product especially for the cost. Invest in a regular camera. This one is no good. Immediately returned
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing app to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: The app offers more editing options. It has more stickers, filters, frames. And it expands from what the Pop comes with too. You can also take advantage of the quick links to order more paper or customer service and even tutorials to get the best out of the Pop and more.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Armas

customer_reviews.title: HD
customer_reviews.text: The Pop can print easily from both the camera and phone which offers more efficiency for me. It has the perks of 1080p/720p hd video capability.
customer_reviews.author: Aniyah S.

customer_reviews.title: Makes the printing process easy
customer_reviews.text: I really like how I don't need a computer or a printer in order to print as I can print directly from the camera! Makes the printing process a whole lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: IT'S JUST OK
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are dull....maybe I need to play around with it some more. It takes a bit for the picture to print. Don't have shaky hands whatsoever the picture will be completely blurry. The 3 stars I gave it is because its fun...convienient and you can choose really fun borders around the picture. And the quality of the paper is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with an Instrux book. Never could figure out how to work it. So returned it.
customer_reviews.author: brandydog

customer_reviews.title: Worth the smiles it spreads :)
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a hit! Even if it's flawed, the return of a shared physical copy of a photo had bought smiles to many since Christmas. Best used as a printer of photos taken with your phone, but the built in camera makes it handy when in a hurry. Very much recommended, just budget for a huge pile of Zink paper and go!
customer_reviews.author: Londonese

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful people, awesome camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because in the midst of the epidemic our photographer flakes out when I am 8 months pregnant. Needed for the hospital photos of our baby. I found this and ordered and contacted the seller, he was so very nice and helped me get this camera on time before I went into labor. I would give 100 stars if I could!!! We are so grateful!!! The camera itself is super cool too, I love that it connects to my phone and can print anything! The fun frames and all the stuff that came with it will be fun to use to keep track of milestones with our new baby!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie M Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Polaroid evolution
customer_reviews.text: It used to be just taking photos and printing them. But thanks to Pop, polaroid can now upload to your phone and sharing in Facebook with just one click. If you don’t want to share a photo, you can capture a Gif with your Pop then share the fun in social media.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha M

customer_reviews.title: Polaroid Camera & Wireless printing capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my niece. She found it easy to use after reading pamphlet enclosed. Very pleased the camera also prints pictures from her phone. Great gift choice, I was pleased the camera came with another box of film, cute borders to cover white frame around photo. Also enclosed a rope w miniature clothes pins to hang multiple pictures on to display easily on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydid56

customer_reviews.title: Fix printer first!
customer_reviews.text: I would love to love this camera! A camera with a 20 megapixel you would expect a better picture quality. The print is junk. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Hoang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to take kids or pets pictures as they can’t stay still for too long
customer_reviews.text: Hard to take good pictures especially for kids. No optical stabilizers, blurry pictures if they did not stay still for more than 5sec. After 5 prints, the pop is overheating. When prints, it make noticeable noise. Overall picture color is kind dark, do not have good filters. Not for us.
customer_reviews.author: HappyYellow

customer_reviews.title: Quickly Returned
customer_reviews.text: Very poor picture quality. I returned this product, very bummed. The picture quality was SO grainy and just terrible. The first picture I took was inside, and I thought maybe the lighting was bad. So I gave it the benefit of the doubt and took a few more, nope they all looked the same. Nothing like the other Polaroid cameras that instantly print. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Straight
customer_reviews.text: I can use this straight out of the box. Works like wonders too if you ask me. I'm very much satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Impressive little prints
customer_reviews.text: I love how I am able to get such cute little prints right on the spot! The quality is pretty impressive, too, given their size.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan TRUONG

customer_reviews.title: I like the touch screen
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the fact that this camera comes with a touch screen as it allows me to get a much better visual of what I'm shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Easton Taft

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality pictures!!! Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst camera I have ever used , I gave it as a gift and the young lady was so disappointed, I can’t believe even some little (kids cameras are better than this !
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Images appear as they are getting printed
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice that there's no need to wave around your photo after it prints. Instead, the images appear right as they are getting printed.
customer_reviews.author: Carson MORLEY

customer_reviews.title: App for life
customer_reviews.text: The new and improved polaroid app is so awesome because it lets me unleash my creativity for the photos that I was planning to share online. It offers more editing opportunities that way too cool to miss out.
customer_reviews.author: Alglberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited for this camera, but it totally didn't live up to my expectations. The image quality was not good. The app to print pictures from your phone didn't work great at all. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, disappointing prints. Plus for being able to share and print elsewhere, however.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality really not that great--I know it's a Polaroid, but kind of disappointing. This is digital, so we can share photos and also get them printed elsewhere, but the in-camera prints - I seem to remember the original Polaroids back in the day being clearer and sharper. Prints are washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie P.

customer_reviews.title: Has many features I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an instant camera that DID NOT print right away, so you could view your photo or print later, I also wanted connectivity to share photos taken. This camera has every quality I desired. I gifted it to my grandma and she is able to use every feature without issue.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both always loved Polaroid cameras. The pictures are a very good clear version Of traditional Polaroid pictures. I will say that it makes it easier to load the film if you slightly push the blue card a little bit forward. Also when uploading photos to print they come better if you crop them square first. Otherwise we are very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: retro meets modern fun
customer_reviews.text: my 12 yr old loves it. kids are typically more tech savy than adults these days. i have tried it and its very easy to use, fun and the editing before you print is cool. retro fun with a modern twist!
customer_reviews.author: FR8Zilla

customer_reviews.title: Currently can’t print photos from your mobile device
customer_reviews.text: Effectively useless to print photos from on your phone. There app doesn’t work. Only can print pictures taken from the device until their app is updated. Asked when app would be updated and They said they don’t know. So if you are wanted to print from you phone, don’t purchase. Who knows how long it will take to get this mysterious update.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I like the classic design that this camera possesses. I'm proud to carry it everywhere. So easy to take photos with too.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Happy with how all of my prints have come out
customer_reviews.text: I think that this instant print camera is just the perfect size! It is able to fit comfortably in my hand while the touchscreen is still easy to use as well. I am very happy with how all of my prints have come out, too.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this in July for my daughters birthday in October. It was the only thing she wanted and it was not cheap. 0 stars. It doesn’t work because the app is not compatible with the newest i0s software. So it is unusable. They are working on an update but until then the connectivity will not work. And no timeline. It could be months. My daughter said she would like to wait and see because it’s what she really wanted. But until then it’s useless. $200 on something that doesn’t work. Save your money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love my polaroid pop! The picture quality of the device could be better.. but it has a great feature that you can connect your phone to it amd print from there! I can print amazing pictures. Its so convenient to chose the pictures that im printing as well! I have the polaroid camera as well but I prefer my pop because I can always get a perfect picture!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Pictures not good
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality was real dark even with a lot of light on
customer_reviews.author: Victor Mack

customer_reviews.title: poloroid pop camera/printer combo
customer_reviews.text: I received a poloroid pop camera as a birthday gift this past summer. The first one sent had a crushed screan. 2nd one was ok. I'm just not happy with the photos. they're blurry. the flash is too bright and seems to stay on too long, allowing person to move or bling
customer_reviews.author: aunt debbie

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product! Absolutely recommend! Only issue is that the colored section of the outside got scuff marks and I can’t figure out how to remove. Nothing I’ve tried works so far. Excellent purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Holte

customer_reviews.title: Faces show right away
customer_reviews.text: No need to keep shaking the photo paper for the images to actually show. It's pretty awesome knowing it prints quicker than the other polaroid which means les anticipating and more snapping photos here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy for a camera, recorder, editor, and printer. “Not professional grade”
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my 12 year old son can take pictures for the birth of his sister. Camera is amazing, good battery life, easy features for use: as a camera, recorder, editor, and printer. My son loves it and I love it too. Everything needed is included but the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn Green

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the bundle & it was worth it! Came with a lot of stuff plus 40 sheets, this has so many bad reviews but it is a good quick film print out! Absolutely obsessed 💛💛💛💛💛
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Reyes

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this instant print camera! My favorite part has to be the touchscreen because you won't find that on many other instant print cameras.
customer_reviews.author: h Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy.  Low resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, so have only used it lightly while I was setting it up. It does seem like a fun toy. But the pictures that it produced seemed surprisingly low resolution. While I certainly didn't expect professional quality prints to come out of a mini Polaroid instant photo camera, I had expected better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Gud Spellur

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Picture quality isn't what it should be at this day and age. Case bottom can bend the pictures if you aren't careful putting the cover back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Was really excited
customer_reviews.text: To receive the product and I really wanted to like it! However the 16 mp touchscreen did not look 16 mp. The quality of the pics is pretty terrible. The pictures came out dark even when I used pictures from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time returning
customer_reviews.text: I was very exciting to have this one. I was able to take pictures and print what I want to print. However this is second time returning and will try one more time before I let this product go. First return was due to loud noise when printing. Second return is due to unable to turn off when the screen turned weird as attached pictures. Im returning and will get a new one. Hopefully this one works ok. If it still doesnt work, i will not use this product anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Borders messed up
customer_reviews.text: This Polaroid was working perfectly for a day, but now (2nd day) it’s been printing without the correct borders.... also, when I try to crop the picture through the app it doesn’t keep the crop. So I have to manually go to my picture on my phone and crop it myself. It was perfect for one day, now I don’t know what’s wrong with it
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and frames
customer_reviews.text: I love it the only problem I didn’t get the photo album that it shows with the package so I was a little disappointed but it was a birthday gift
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: None of my paper goes to waste
customer_reviews.text: The touchscreen is a really great added bonus to this camera as I can see all of my shots before I print. Therefore, none of my paper goes to waste!
customer_reviews.author: Erick BURNSIDE

customer_reviews.title: Print of pictures not that great.
customer_reviews.text: I am slightly disappointed with this camera. The print quality isn't as good as I would have thought it would be. I'm now wondering if I should have gone with a cheaper one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works very fast
customer_reviews.text: This instant print camera works very fast. Indeed, it takes me hardly any time to take a photo and printing it out is a breeze, too. I have even found the editing process to be very simple and quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dominica Begay

customer_reviews.title: very impressed with polaroid
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great camera and so much more, so glad polaroid finally opened up and made their own portable digital instant print camera. With it I can share on social media, connect with other devices like my phone to print, and of course, make beautiful photographs in that classic polaroid style. I've never been so impressed with an instant printer before, I think it's one of a kind and will make a big splash on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: good job polaroid
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get this polaroid pop and try it out for myself! I've read so many great reviews about his thing I just had to have it. I've always been a polaroid fan. This instant printer camera does it all in classic polaroid fashion with all the modern ammenities. Never have I had such a powerful camera printer combination. I took it out for a trial run today and was so impressed. What a great camera, good job polaroid!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Deffinitly not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The camera is a cool concept, in theory. But I was highly displeased with the quality on the screen. I HAVE NOT been able to see how the quality of the prints are as my camera did not come with the 5 sheets as described. I went to go buy sheets I went to Walmart Target Best buy even Mike's camera shop and never found them. I was unable to use this camera for the one thing I wanted to use it for during my birth and fist moments with baby and that makes me truley sad
customer_reviews.author: Tamii and Scott

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality was bad but the worst part was that there was a water mark stain on the screen. Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Buquicchio

customer_reviews.title: Fun little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It’s awesome that I can print pictures from my phone too. The quality is decent, I mean don’t buy it thinking that your going to get studio quality prints. It’s simple and fun it’s just what I needed for like my everyday memory keeping. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The app takes a lot of space on your phone so beware, other that that my son loves this camera! Pic quality is just like other polaroids back in the day with a high tech upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Boe

customer_reviews.title: Precision
customer_reviews.text: This polaroid uses precision step motor shutter which highlights its amazing usage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M Dashner

customer_reviews.title: Great little Polaroid camera
customer_reviews.text: It prints like an old school Polaroid which is what I expected and so I'm happy We bought this for my 5 year old; she can operate it herself and loves to make "books" and send people cards using her pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Zappacosta

customer_reviews.title: simply amazed
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is wow, I've never been so impressed with a polaroid product before. I never liked the old printers and thought they were tacky, but this one combines modern tech like wifi and access to social and so many other features that I can't help but praising it. Of course I'll need a few weeks to try it out and then I'll write another more detailed review, but my first impression is one of amazement.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Keith

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: was excited to use it but the quality isnt good. kept getting lines on the print out. stopped working after minimal use. returned.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: great time
customer_reviews.text: Just got my very own polaroid pop 2.0 in the mail and I'm having a great time with it. I never knew polaroid could make such an impressive instant printer. The modern features are really stunning, I've never had such a powerful little printer camera before. You know what they say, with great power comes great responsibility. I know I'll have a ball taking this thing to parties and other social functions.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Camera works good, touch screen isn't very good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter like the camera for pictures. The touch screen doesn't work very good so its almost impossible to add little titles and doodles to the pictures. Pictures do print out nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: proud to own my own
customer_reviews.text: I'll just come out there and say it, I was so excited to get my poloaroid pop in the mail you can't imagine. I love polaroid products and couldn't wait to try out their version of an instant print camera. It's everything I had hoped for and more, the classic polaroid photo style combined with modern features and video capability makes it a one of a kind instant printer that I'm proud to call my own.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Rohrbach

customer_reviews.title: The Big Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t do reviews. I decided to order the package they had. It came with so much stuff that I was able to make it become 3 different gifts! This was one of my Best Buy’s thus far, and I order things at least twice a week. Thanks so much... Can’t stop smiling...
customer_reviews.author: The Macs

customer_reviews.title: Great as a fun toy for kids/teens, terrible as a real camera.
customer_reviews.text: As a professional photographer, I don’t like this camera because I’m extremely unimpressed with the picture and print quality (grainy, lines, etc). As the mom who gifted this to my 6 year old daughter, I love it because it’s easy to use, it looks cool, and it’s fun to use. IMO this product is a toy (for probably up through mid teen years). Beware that the film paper is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Urcan

customer_reviews.title: Fun but low quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality on the camera is very low-like an old flip phone. The printer jams and the photos printed from the phone (iPhone 6s) are poor quality. However, my 12 year old loves the novelty of a Polaroid and does seem very happy with having her own camera.
customer_reviews.author: JWalter

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is just ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact of digital Polaroid but the color depth of each photo is not as vibrant as I would like for it to be. It’s as if it has a smokey filter on.
customer_reviews.author: pedro macea

customer_reviews.title: nice option for instant picture
customer_reviews.text: Nice option for instant picture but the quality of the printed photos are not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Hebert J. Sanchez G.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I had high hopes for this. I liked the fact I could link to my phone to print. However once receiving the item and using I wished I wouldn’t have wasted my money. The picture quality is terrible no matter what setting. The print quality is even worse! The film is ridiculously expensive and you waste is because the prints are the worst. Honestly don’t waste you money!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use BUT the quality of pictures is so poor that it’s pointless to have it. Not worth the money! I’ll stick to my old InstaX.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Not to cool, not so bad.
customer_reviews.text: So... Is not the greatest insta-printer, it makes this weird noise when is printing out! Not the best quality. But works for kids.. to have fun taking pictures of pets and anything.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Instant Memories to share.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality photos, but in the age of digital pics we never print this is great for instant memories you can pass on.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Print pics from your smart phone or directly from this camera. It has it all!!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter td .e about this camera. So I did my research and got it for her and she absolutely loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Inga R

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for christmas for my daughter. She loves it. I plan to use it for parties. I like that it's the polaroid film with the ability to pick the photo you want to print.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Toth

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My sister got me the polaroid pop for my birthday and i have to say I couldn't be happier with it! it's really a superior instant print camera. I've had other brands before but polaroid's has really blown the competition out of the water. Just look at all the many things you can do with it and you'll understand why this is one of the best. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric_Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It can take high quality videos!
customer_reviews.text: For an instant print camera of this size, it sure is able to do a lot. For one, it can take high quality photos and print them out in the same quality, too. What's nice is that all that I need to print is the paper, nothing more. It is also able of taking high quality videos, too!
customer_reviews.author: Renato Delen

customer_reviews.title: well done polaroid
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned an instant print camera before but I've always wanted one. I'm kind of a fan for the polaroid style so I only buy their cameras. As soon as I found out about this new model I bought it. All I can say is wow. It's really a great combination of polaroid style with modern features like wifi, sharing, and editing software. Well done polaroid!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Turner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. The picture quality is poor and the company is not helpful in resolving the issue. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. Easy to use although film is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmama A

customer_reviews.title: Takes nice photos
customer_reviews.text: The camera works very well. Takes nice photo. Lots of features. Reminds me of the old Polaroid cameras which were a lot of fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: George F Leonard Jr

customer_reviews.title: revolutionary camera
customer_reviews.text: Man this polaroid pop is revolutionary! Finally polaroid has their own modern instant printer! Small and convenient to carry, I wish they had come out with this thing sooner, I would have bought it right up! Connects to wifi so you can print from social media, beautiful design, classic polaroid prints, I'm really falling in love with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: June Noriega

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: Polaroid pop has blown my mind of what I think an instant printer could be. I don't know about you but I was a little skeptical of polaroids ability to make a great instant printer but once I tried it out I understood that the capabilitie are limitless. You can do almost anything with this amazing little camera, even take highquality videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Torres

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I got my polaroid pop 2.0 in the mail yesterday and immediately tore it out of the box and got snapping. Syncs with all my devices seamlessly, I've never seen so much great tech and elegant design in a polaroid product before. It's really impessed me to say the least. I can't wait to show my friends and see the jealous look on their faces.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with product but no album
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't need four cases for the camera and I didn't receive the photo album... otherwise I am pleased with the product....thank you evelyncarbone8@gmail.com....
customer_reviews.author: evelyncar

customer_reviews.title: an even bigger fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little instant print camera and so much more. I like the video camera capabilities, really makes you feel like you have more control behind the lens. What's more, it connects to wifi so you can print from all of your favorite social media sites. I've always enjoyed polaroid products but now I'm an even bigger fan.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Bowman

customer_reviews.title: daughter is loving it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is having a great time using her new polaroid pop. She's always been into photographs and loves the classic polaroid. I saw this new model and knew she would be impressed with it. Gave it to her as a welcome back to school gift. Here's hoping all the kids stay healthy and virus free and the schools will stay open all year!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ehrhart

customer_reviews.title: birthday gift for son
customer_reviews.text: My son just turned 13 so I thought it was high time he have a camera of his own. Our family has always loved polaroid so it was a no brainer once I saw that they had an instant print camera available. He's in love with it of course, like father like son, and can't stop snapping photos of all the wonderful things life has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Macgregor

customer_reviews.title: Total worth it great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purchase Photo quality is really good and love the fact you can store and print
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: The polaroid pop is a really great instant print camera, I can't believe how well it shoots and how much I can do with it. I've been taking it out partying lately and all I can say is I'm having a ball getting up close and personal with my friends. Who would have thought taking pictures could be this much fun? Love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor S.

product_meta.title: Zink Polaroid Pop 2.0 2 in 1 Wireless Portable Instant 3x4 Photo Printer & Digital 20MP Camera with Touchscreen Display, Built-in Wi-Fi, 1080p HD Video (Blue) Prints From your Smartphone
product_meta.description: Moments become memories-with just a pop Giving your instant photos A ‘shake, shake, shake’ was all part of the magic, right? In hindsight, the ritual resulted in blurry blobs of color, and more photography ‘fails’ than 'wins. ’ now, you can enjoy Perfect color pictures faster and easier than before with the Polaroid POP instant print camera. This palm-sized gadget is one part contemporary, one part classic, delivering gorgeous 3. 5” x 4. 25” photos with the iconic Polaroid Border. Say goodbye to slow shutter speed, and stop flapping your pics only to find a fuzzy outcome. The camera may look like a cool little toy, but it boasts a ton of techie features designed for the digital age. In addition to awesome ZINK Zero Ink technology, HD video lets you film live GIFs, record sound, listen back, and save on a Micro SD card up to 128GB. Internal memory: Holds up to 10 images. Use the 3. 97” viewfinder and touchscreen display to add filters, borders, captions and stickers to your snaps before printing instantly. From Wi-Fi connectivity and built-in flash to digital zoom and photo booth mode, the new POP makes anything possible
feature_bullets: Print & edit Photos instantly: we've kept the iconic 3.5 x 4.25 inch Prints with the classic Polaroid Border, but now you can add Notes & captions with Your finger or emoji's and shapes on the 4 inch touch screen Display before you Print

Premium specs: with built in Wi Fi you can instantly Share Photos on Facebook, Instagram or Anywhere else; The Camera Takes Stunningly vivid shots with a 20 mega pixel lens; The built in speaker and mic lets you record video

Best Mini Camera: the pop 2. 0 Polaroid is unlike any other instant Camera you've Experienced before; It makes an awesome gift, it’s great as a Portable Travel Camera, and it's Perfect for use at parties and special events like weddings

Mini photo & video Camera: Not only Does this classic Polaroid Camera let you Snap and Print pictures instantly; You can record Full 1080 HD video or a fun gif; With Zink Zero Ink paper technology, there is toner, no film, no shaking this new spin on an old classic is truly instant

Portable pic Printer: Not just a Camera, This Polaroid can Print Photos from almost any device; Connect Your Smart phone, computer or Tablet to the Camera and you can edit and Print the Photos as if you just Snapped them on the Camera itself
